tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got sudden unbearable pain in iliac crest which was unbearable. Due to the pandemic issue we were scared of going to any hospital. I found Dr Bali on Practo. I was little bit confused if I should prefer practo. But trust me Dr Bali was really good. Most important he listened to me very patiently and very friendly. For a patient it is really important that someone should listen them carefully which doctors usually dont  . But trust me after talking to Dr. Bali I felt relaxed. I am having medicines prescribed, hoping for the best outcome. Thanks a lot and loads of gratitude n respect to the doctor . It is already difficult times everyone going through , I really thanks doctor for listening me .
reply_text: Thanks Swati for the wonderful words. Wishing you good health and happiness.

review: Happy with diagnose procedure, but unsatisfied with the explanation on the problem. Nothing has happen anyways, there are certain reason.
reply_text:
Dear Patient, 

              Short duration pain in muscle and joints can occur many a time without any disease or pathology. The causative factors may include- anxiety, weather change, lack of exercise, viamin D deficiency, food allergy, seasonal allergy, cigarettes, alcohol, obesity, depression etc. Many a time it is not possible to pin-point the exact cause of short duration pain.

                                                       Dr Sankalp Bali
